Statements.Statement: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Products WHERE CategoryID = @id @brand) AS TotalCount, p.*, C.DiscountPercent FROM Products p LEFT JOIN ProductPromotions A on A.ProductID = p.ProductID LEFT JOIN Promotions C on C.PromotionID = A.PromotionID WHERE p.CategoryID = @id @brand @sortOrder LIMIT @page, @pageSize;

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProductPromotions A LEFT JOIN Promotions C on C.PromotionID = A.PromotionID WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() >= C.StartDate AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP <= C.EndDate) AS TotalCount, P.* FROM (SELECT B.*, C.DiscountPercent FROM ProductPromotions A LEFT JOIN Products B on B.ProductID = A.ProductID LEFT JOIN Promotions C on C.PromotionID = A.PromotionID WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() >= C.StartDate AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP <= C.EndDate LIMIT @page, @pageSize) P
SELECT p.*, C.DiscountPercent FROM Products p LEFT JOIN ProductPromotions A on A.ProductID = p.ProductID LEFT JOIN Promotions C on C.PromotionID = A.PromotionID WHERE p.ProductID = @id;
SELECT A.*, B.FullName FROM Reviews A LEFT JOIN Users B ON B.UserID = A.UserID WHERE A.ProductID = @id ORDER BY A.Rating DESC;

UPDATE Products SET ProductName = @ProductName, CategoryID = @CategoryID, Brand = @Brand, Price = @Price, Stock = @Stock, Description = @Description, ImageURL = @ImageURL WHERE ProductID = @ProductID;

SELECT ( SELECT count(*) FROM Products WHERE productName LIKE CONCAT('%', @query, '%')) AS TotalCount, P.*, C.DiscountPercent FROM Products P LEFT JOIN ProductPromotions A on A.ProductID = P.ProductID LEFT JOIN Promotions C on C.PromotionID = A.PromotionID WHERE productName LIKE CONCAT('%', @query, '%') LIMIT @page, @pageSize;
SELECT p.*, pp.PromotionID FROM Products p LEFT JOIN ProductPromotions pp ON p.ProductID = pp.ProductID WHERE pp.ProductID IS NULL OR pp.PromotionID = @id;
